name: PAT_ENC_PAS
description: PAS items for a patient encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: AMBULANCE_INCIDENT_NUM
columns.description: The unique identifier of a patient's journey, via ambulance, to a place where the patient received care.

columns.name: AMBULANCE_ORG_POS_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the place of service that provided ambulance service for the patient.
